reports.title: Respondent's ages
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WITH 
  CASE 
    WHEN p.age < 15 THEN '10-14'
    WHEN p.age < 20 THEN '15-19'
    WHEN p.age < 25 THEN '20-24'
    WHEN p.age < 30 THEN '25-29'
    WHEN p.age < 35 THEN '30-34'
    WHEN p.age < 40 THEN '35-39'
    WHEN p.age < 45 THEN '40-44'
    WHEN p.age < 50 THEN '45-49'
    WHEN p.age < 55 THEN '50-54'
    WHEN p.age < 60 THEN '55-59'
    WHEN p.age < 65 THEN '60-64'
    WHEN p.age < 70 THEN '65-69'
    WHEN p.age < 75 THEN '70-74'
    ELSE '75+'
  END as `Age Range`,
  COUNT(p) as `Number of Respondents`
RETURN `Age Range`, `Number of Respondents`
ORDER BY 
  CASE `Age Range`
    WHEN '10-14' THEN 1
    WHEN '15-19' THEN 2
    WHEN '20-24' THEN 3
    WHEN '25-29' THEN 4
    WHEN '30-34' THEN 5
    WHEN '35-39' THEN 6
    WHEN '40-44' THEN 7
    WHEN '45-49' THEN 8
    WHEN '50-54' THEN 9
    WHEN '55-59' THEN 10
    WHEN '60-64' THEN 11
    WHEN '65-69' THEN 12
    WHEN '70-74' THEN 13
    ELSE 14
  END;

reports.title: Number of hours respondent listens to music per day
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.hours_per_day IS NOT NULL
RETURN 
    CASE
        WHEN p.hours_per_day <= 2.4 THEN '0-2.4'
        WHEN p.hours_per_day <= 4.8 THEN '2.4-4.8'
        WHEN p.hours_per_day <= 7.2 THEN '4.8-7.2'
        WHEN p.hours_per_day <= 9.6 THEN '7.2-9.6'
        ELSE '9.6+'
    END as `Hours Range`,
    COUNT(*) as count,
    round(toFloat(COUNT(*)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 2) as percentage
ORDER BY substring(`Hours Range`, 0, 1);

reports.title: listen to music while studying/working?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.while_working IS NOT NULL
WITH p.while_working as while_working, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
   while_working as `Listens While Working`,
   count as count,
   round(toFloat(count) * 100 / 736, 2) as percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Instrumentalist?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.instrumentalist IS NOT NULL
WITH p.instrumentalist as plays, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
   plays as `Plays Instrument`,
   count as count,
   round(toFloat(count) * 100 / 736, 2) as percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Composer?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.composer IS NOT NULL
WITH p.composer as composes, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
   composes as `Composes Music`,
   count as count,
   round(toFloat(count) * 100 / 736, 2) as percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Respondent's favorite or top genre
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WITH p.favorite_genre as genre, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
    genre as Genre,
    count as Count,
    round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / 736, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Do they explore new artists/genres?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.exploratory IS NOT NULL
WITH p.exploratory as explores, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
    explores as `Explores New Music`,
    count as Count,
    round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / 736, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY Count DESC;

reports.title: Listen to foreign language music?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.foreign_languages IS NOT NULL
WITH p.foreign_languages as foreign, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
   foreign as `Listens Foreign Language`,
   count as count,
   round(toFloat(count) * 100 / 736, 2) as percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Primary streaming services
reports.query:
// Count users per streaming service and calculate percentages
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:USES]->(s:StreamingService)
WITH 
   s.name as `Streaming Service`, 
   COUNT(p) as Count,
   toFloat(COUNT(p) * 100) / 736 as Percentage
RETURN 
   `Streaming Service`,
   Count,
   round(Percentage, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY Count DESC;

reports.title: N of Respondents
reports.query: MATCH (p:Person) RETURN COUNT(p)

reports.title: Favorite genre
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WITH p.favorite_genre as genre, count(*) as count
RETURN genre, count
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 1

reports.title: Primary streaming services
reports.query:
// Count users per streaming service and calculate percentages
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:USES]->(s:StreamingService)
WITH 
   s.name as `Streaming Service`, 
   COUNT(p) as Count,
   toFloat(COUNT(p) * 100) / 736 as Percentage
RETURN 
   `Streaming Service`,
   Count,
   round(Percentage, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY Count DESC;

reports.title: Genres
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WITH p.favorite_genre as genre, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
    genre as Genre,
    count as Count,
    round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / 736, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Which age group listens to some type of genre more frequently (detailed)
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE l.frequency = 'Very frequently'
WITH 
    CASE 
        WHEN p.age < 20 THEN 'Under 20'
        WHEN p.age < 30 THEN '20-29'
        WHEN p.age < 40 THEN '30-39'
        WHEN p.age < 50 THEN '40-49'
        ELSE '50+'
    END as age_group,
    g.name as genre,
    COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
    age_group as `Age Group`,
    genre as Genre,
    count as Count,
    round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / 736, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY 
    CASE age_group
        WHEN 'Under 20' THEN 1
        WHEN '20-29' THEN 2
        WHEN '30-39' THEN 3
        WHEN '40-49' THEN 4
        ELSE 5
    END,
    count DESC;

reports.title: Most used streaming service for age groups
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:USES]->(s:StreamingService)
WITH 
   CASE 
       WHEN p.age < 20 THEN 'Under 20'
       WHEN p.age < 30 THEN '20-29'
       WHEN p.age < 40 THEN '30-39'
       WHEN p.age < 50 THEN '40-49'
       ELSE '50+'
   END as age_group,
   s.name as service,
   COUNT(*) as count
WITH age_group, service, count
ORDER BY count DESC
WITH age_group, COLLECT({service: service, count: count})[0] as top_service
RETURN 
   age_group as `Age Group`,
   top_service.service as `Most Used Service`,
   top_service.count as Count
ORDER BY 
   CASE age_group
       WHEN 'Under 20' THEN 1
       WHEN '20-29' THEN 2
       WHEN '30-39' THEN 3
       WHEN '40-49' THEN 4
       ELSE 5
   END;

reports.title: What genres are most liked by instrumentalists
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.instrumentalist = 'Yes'
WITH p.favorite_genre as genre, COUNT(*) as count
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.instrumentalist = 'Yes'
WITH genre, count, COUNT(p) as total_instrumentalists
RETURN 
   genre as Genre,
   count as Count,
   round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / total_instrumentalists, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Respondents by age, how many hours per day do they listen to music?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WITH 
   CASE 
       WHEN p.age < 20 THEN 'Under 20'
       WHEN p.age < 30 THEN '20-29'
       WHEN p.age < 40 THEN '30-39'
       WHEN p.age < 50 THEN '40-49'
       ELSE '50+'
   END as age_group,
   p.hours_per_day as hours
WITH 
   age_group,
   COUNT(*) as person_count,
   round(AVG(hours), 2) as avg_hours
RETURN 
   age_group as `Age Group`,
   person_count as `Number of People`,
   avg_hours as `Average Hours Per Day`
ORDER BY 
   CASE age_group
       WHEN 'Under 20' THEN 1
       WHEN '20-29' THEN 2
       WHEN '30-39' THEN 3
       WHEN '40-49' THEN 4
       ELSE 5
   END;

reports.title: What kind of genre of music do people choose to listen while it's their foreign language
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.foreign_languages = 'Yes'
WITH p.favorite_genre as genre, COUNT(*) as count
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.foreign_languages = 'Yes'
WITH genre, count, COUNT(p) as total_foreign_listeners
RETURN 
   genre as Genre,
   count as Count,
   round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / total_foreign_listeners, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: By composers
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.composer = 'Yes'
WITH p.favorite_genre as genre, COUNT(*) as count
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.composer = 'Yes'
WITH genre, count, COUNT(p) as total_composer
RETURN 
   genre as Genre,
   count as Count,
   round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / total_composer, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: Most popular music genres by age
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WITH 
   CASE 
       WHEN p.age < 20 THEN 'Under 20'
       WHEN p.age < 30 THEN '20-29'
       WHEN p.age < 40 THEN '30-39'
       WHEN p.age < 50 THEN '40-49'
       ELSE '50+'
   END as age_group,
   p.favorite_genre as genre,
   COUNT(*) as count
WITH age_group, genre, count
ORDER BY count DESC
WITH age_group, COLLECT({genre: genre, count: count})[0] as top_genre
RETURN 
   age_group as `Age Group`,
   top_genre.genre as `Most Popular Genre`,
   top_genre.count as Count
ORDER BY 
   CASE age_group
       WHEN 'Under 20' THEN 1
       WHEN '20-29' THEN 2
       WHEN '30-39' THEN 3
       WHEN '40-49' THEN 4
       ELSE 5
   END;

reports.title: How music affect mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)
WHERE p.music_effects IS NOT NULL
WITH p.music_effects as effect, COUNT(*) as count
RETURN 
   effect as `Music Effect`,
   count as Count,
   round(toFloat(count * 100.0) / 736, 2) as Percentage
ORDER BY count DESC;

reports.title: People between 10-20 and their mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.age >= 10 AND p.age <= 20
  AND m.type IN ['Anxiety', 'Insomnia', 'Depression', 'OCD']
RETURN 
    m.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(r.severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY mental_health_issue

reports.title: Instrumentalists and their mental health issues status
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WITH p AS person, m AS mental_health_issue, r.severity AS severity
RETURN 
    person.instrumentalist AS is_instrumentalist,
    mental_health_issue.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY is_instrumentalist, mental_health_issue

reports.title: Does listening to music at work help with mental health issues?
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WITH p AS person, m AS mental_health_issue, r.severity AS severity
RETURN 
    person.while_working AS listens_while_working,
    mental_health_issue.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY listens_while_working, mental_health_issue

reports.title: Composers and their mental health issues status, show their mental health issues status
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WITH p AS person, m AS mental_health_issue, r.severity AS severity
RETURN 
    person.composer AS is_composer,
    mental_health_issue.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY is_composer, mental_health_issue

reports.query:

WITH p.music_effects as effect, COUNT(*) as count

reports.title: 2.5+ hours of listening to music per day and their mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.hours_per_day >= 2.5 AND p.hours_per_day < 5
  AND m.type IN ['Anxiety', 'Insomnia', 'Depression', 'OCD']
RETURN 
    m.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(r.severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY mental_health_issue

reports.title: Listening to music more than 5 hours a day and mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.hours_per_day >= 5
  AND m.type IN ['Anxiety', 'Insomnia', 'Depression', 'OCD']
RETURN 
    m.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(r.severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY mental_health_issue

reports.title: People between 16-20 and their mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.age >= 16 AND p.age <= 20
RETURN 
    p.age AS age,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'OCD' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS ocd,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'Insomnia' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS insomnia,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'Anxiety' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS anxiety,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'Depression' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS depression
ORDER BY age

reports.title: People between 20-30and their mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.age >= 20 AND p.age <= 30
RETURN 
    p.age AS age,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'OCD' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS ocd,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'Insomnia' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS insomniay,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'Anxiety' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS anxiety,
    AVG(CASE WHEN m.type = 'Depression' THEN r.severity ELSE NULL END) AS depression
ORDER BY age

reports.title: Their thoughts vs reality
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[h:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.music_effects IS NOT NULL
WITH 
    p.music_effects as effect,
    m.type as conditions,
    avg(h.severity) as severity
RETURN 
    effect,
    conditions,
    round(severity * 100) / 100 as severity
ORDER BY 
    CASE effect 
        WHEN 'Improve' THEN 1 
        WHEN 'No effect' THEN 2 
        WHEN 'Worsen' THEN 3 
    END,
    conditions;

reports.title: Their thoughts vs reality
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[h:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.music_effects IS NOT NULL
WITH 
    p.music_effects as effect,
    m.type as conditions,
    avg(h.severity) as severity
RETURN 
    effect,
    conditions,
    round(severity * 100) / 100 as severity
ORDER BY effect, conditions

reports.title: Choose Persons age
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Person`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`age`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`age` as value,  n.`age` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Persons age and their average mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
WHERE p.age = $neodash_person_age
  AND m.type IN ['Anxiety', 'Insomnia', 'Depression', 'OCD']
RETURN 
    m.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(r.severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY mental_health_issue

reports.title: Favorite genre = "Rock" and their mental health issues
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person {favorite_genre: 'Rock'})-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->(m:MentalHealthIssue)
RETURN 
    m.type AS mental_health_issue,
    AVG(r.severity) AS avg_severity
ORDER BY mental_health_issue

reports.title: Choose a music genre
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Genre`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Favorite genre = "Rock" and other frequently listened genres
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE p.favorite_genre = 'Rock' AND g.name <> 'Rock' AND l.frequency <> 'Never'
WITH g.name AS genre, AVG(l.frequency_score) AS avgFrequency
ORDER BY avgFrequency DESC
RETURN genre, avgFrequency

reports.title: Favorite genre = "Metal" and other frequently listened genres
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE p.favorite_genre = 'Metal' AND g.name <> 'Metal' AND l.frequency <> 'Never'
WITH g.name AS genre, AVG(l.frequency_score) AS avgFrequency
ORDER BY avgFrequency DESC
RETURN genre, avgFrequency

reports.title: Favorite genre = "Lofi" and other top 3 genres for that person
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE p.favorite_genre = 'Lofi' AND g.name <> 'Lofi' AND l.frequency <> 'Never'
WITH g.name AS genre, AVG(l.frequency_score) AS avgFrequency
ORDER BY avgFrequency DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN genre, avgFrequency

reports.title: Favorite genre = "Pop" and other top 3 genres for that person
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE p.favorite_genre = 'Pop' AND g.name <> 'Pop' AND l.frequency <> 'Never'
WITH g.name AS genre, AVG(l.frequency_score) AS avgFrequency
ORDER BY avgFrequency DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN genre, avgFrequency

reports.title: Choose a genre name
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Genre`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

settings.description: Pick a name of a genre and get other top 3 frequently listened genres for that person

reports.title: top 3 genres for that person
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE p.favorite_genre = $neodash_genre_name AND g.name <> $neodash_genre_name AND l.frequency <> 'Never'
WITH g.name AS genre, AVG(l.frequency_score) AS avgFrequency
ORDER BY avgFrequency DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN genre, avgFrequency

reports.title: Favorite genre = "your pick" and other frequently listened genres
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[l:LISTENS_TO]->(g:Genre)
WHERE p.favorite_genre = $neodash_genre_name AND g.name <> $neodash_genre_name AND l.frequency <> 'Never'
WITH g.name AS genre, AVG(l.frequency_score) AS avgFrequency
ORDER BY avgFrequency DESC
RETURN genre, avgFrequency

reports.title: Person USES Streaming Platform
reports.query: MATCH p=()-[r:USES]->() RETURN p LIMIT 10

reports.title: People
reports.query: MATCH (n:Person) RETURN n LIMIT 25

reports.title: A Person Has Mental Health Condition
reports.query: MATCH p=()-[r:HAS_CONDITION]->() RETURN p LIMIT 25
